metadata.title: CVE-2022-24958 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: drivers/usb/gadget/legacy/inode.c in the Linux kernel through 5.16.8mishandles dev->buf release.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
